data.title: Northern College
data.text:
New At Northern

Pre-Departure Webinar for New International Students

Before the start of the semester we host a virtual pre-departure information session through a Zoom webinar to help new international students get ready to start their academic journey with us at Northern College.

The Fall 2024 pre-departure webinar will be held on Tuesday, July 30, 2024 at 9:00 am EDT.

Learn More

New At Northern

Child Welfare Micro-Credentials

We are now accepting applications for micro-credential opportunities relating to Child Welfare for those working in the field of community services.

Micro-credentials are professional development training opportunities to earn badges or micro-qualifications that indicate that you have developed skills to perform a specific workplace task.

Learn More & Apply

New At Northern

Ontario Learn and Stay Grant

Students in our Nursing & Paramedic programs can apply for the Ontario Learn and Stay Grant.

Our Financial Aid Office is available to support you through the processes of applying.

Learn More

Northern Training Division offers specialized training opportunities to help you hone in on existing skills to advance in your field, help you master a new interest, upskill, or fast-track for success in industries with high demand for skilled labourers.

Whether you are a student, a new graduate or well into your career, our Community Employment Services provides career guidance and support to help you land your dream job.
